name: Design System Configuration
description: Reusable design system - change tokens and apply everywhere

instructions: 1. Update 'tokens' section with your brand values
3. Export as CSS variables, Tailwind config, or use directly in components

quickStart.step1: Change primary brand color in tokens.colors.brand.primary
quickStart.step4: All components will inherit these values automatically

usage.cssVariables: Use tokens to generate CSS custom properties in globals.css
usage.tailwind: Reference tokens in tailwind.config to extend theme
usage.components: Import design.json in components and access token values
usage.documentation: Share this file with designers and developers for consistency

mobileFirst.whitespace: Prioritize generous white space on mobile for better readability
mobileFirst.typography: Use smaller text sizes on mobile, scale up for larger screens

animations.hover: No translation effects - use only color, opacity, and scale transitions
animations.duration: Keep transitions smooth and fast (200ms standard)

shadows.buttons: No shadows on buttons - use solid backgrounds only
shadows.cards: Minimal shadows (sm/md) - avoid overwhelming shadow effects
shadows.principle: Flat, modern aesthetic with subtle depth

consistency.typography: Use design system classes (default-text, default-label, etc.)
consistency.responsive: All text and spacing should scale responsively

responsiveTextClasses.note: All text scales from mobile (smaller) → tablet → desktop (larger)

responsivePaddingPatterns.note: Progressive padding: more white space on larger screens

sectionVerticalSpacing.note: Reduced spacing on mobile for better content density

_usage.buttons: NO SHADOWS - buttons use solid backgrounds only
_usage.cards: Use 'sm' or 'md' only - avoid xl shadows for flat, modern look
_usage.principle: Minimal shadows throughout - prefer flat design with subtle depth

_guidelines.hover: Use color, opacity, background changes - NO translate/transform
_guidelines.scale: Subtle scale (1.03 max) acceptable for cards on hover
_guidelines.duration: Keep most transitions at 200ms for snappy feel
_guidelines.forbidden: No -translate-y, translate-x, or vertical movement on hover

classes.default-heading: text-3xl on mobile → text-5xl on desktop
classes.default-text: text-sm on mobile → text-lg on desktop
classes.default-label: text-xs on mobile → text-base on desktop

typography.result: Better readability on mobile with meaningful white space

spacing.principle: More padding on larger screens for generous white space

shadows.buttons: REMOVED - no shadows on any buttons
shadows.result: Flat, modern aesthetic with subtle depth

animations.kept: Color transitions, opacity changes, subtle scale (max 1.03)

colorUsage.variety: Added secondary (blue) and accent (pink) for diversity

components.footer: Enhanced responsive design with 2-col mobile grid
components.pricing: Uses consistent design system text classes
